section.title: roles master list of Maintain Roles
section.para: The Maintain Roles section enables xtuple administrators privileges maintained by system administrators to create common groups of user privileges. Then, when new users are added, the users can be assigned to the user role they should belong to. Having user roles simplifies the process of adding new users into the system. The following screen will appear when you select the "Maintain Roles" option:
The "Maintain Roles" screen displays information on all existing user roles, including role name and description.

listitem.para: Closes the screen, returning you to the application desktop.
Opens screen for creating a new user role.

Enables you to edit highlighted user roles. The edit screen is the same as that for creating a new user role—except that when editing, the fields will contain user role information. Double-clicking on a user role will also bring you to the editing screen.
Highlight a user role and then select this button to reach a read-only view of the "Edit" screen.
Highlight a user role and then select this button to remove the user role from the list.
